forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
